  • Constructor Details

    • GameScene

      public GameScene(javafx.scene.Group parent, int WIDTH, int HEIGHT, String fileName, String type)
      Creates a GameScene for a specific root Node with a specific size by loading parameters from the XmlReader based on the type of scene we create.
      Parameters:
      parent - GameScene's root Node.
      WIDTH - window's width.
      HEIGHT - window's height.
      fileName - xml file's name.
      type - specifies the type of scene you want to create (!! Case Sensitive). Accepted values: level, room.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Lunches a timer which calls the update and render methods. This is the main loop of the game.

    • render

      public void render(long time)
      Renders every element's display periodically based on the time parameter.
      Parameters:
      time - elapsed time since last call.
      See Also:
      • Hero.render(Camera camera)
      • Background.render()
      • TileManager.render(long time)

    • getSceneCamera

      public Camera getSceneCamera()
      Returns:
      the value of the property camera.

    • getHero

      public Hero getHero()
      Returns:
      the value of the property hero.

    • playSoundInf

      public void playSoundInf(String filename)
      Is used to indefinitely play a sound saved in the resources' directory that matches with the filename parameter. If none of the files match, a NullPointerException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      filename - sound's file name to be played.
      See Also:
      • AudioClip

    • getTileManager

      public TileManager getTileManager()
      Returns:
      the value of the property tileManager.

    • getCollisionChecker

      Returns:
      the value of the property collisionChecker.
